title: Couple of Logofonts I can not identify
content:
01-undivided

looks like Bryant Pro Alt except the 'd'.

02-Helion AG

No clue!!

03-French Property Exhibition

First I thought it is Futura, but the 'R' is different.

04-mosquito

No clue!! (But I think i have seen and used it some time ago)

05-The City

I just lovee this logo and the Font. Can anyone help to identify it.

Thanks for your help. (This is my first post and I hope I haven't made any mistakes)

Visualpropaganda

comments.content: I think French Property Exhibition is [Avenir.](http://web.archive.org/web/20130308073901/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/avenir/)

DrDoc,

you are right.  
(Damn I use Avenir in my stationary. I think I worked to hard today looking at logos and fonts for hours).

Now I hope someone can help with the others.

Thanks  
Visualpropagnda

"mosquito" looks like a mix of Chalet Comprime Milan 1960 and 1970.

- Lex
